TaskDefinition: The private access key needed for cloning the config repository, used by the ConfigService, shoud be present in the AWS Systems Manager Parameter Store

[{u'LogConfiguration': {u'LogDriver': u'awslogs', u'Options': {u'awslogs-group': u'LogGroupName', u'awslogs-region': u'AWS::Region'}}, u'Name': u'ContainerDefinitionName', u'Image': u'ContainerImage', u'Environment': [{u'Name': u'SPRING_PROFILES_ACTIVE', u'Value': u'SpringProfilesActive'}, {u'Name': u'SPRING_CLOUD_CONFIG_SERVER_GIT_URI', u'Value': u'SpringCloudConfigServerURI'}, {u'Name': u'SPRING_CLOUD_CONFIG_SERVER_GIT_IGNORE_LOCAL_SSH_SETTINGS', u'Value': True}, {u'Name': u'SPRING_CLOUD_CONFIG_SERVER_GIT_HOST_KEY', u'Value': [u'GitHostKeys', u'GitHost', u'Key']}, {u'Name': u'SPRING_CLOUD_CONFIG_SERVER_GIT_HOST_KEY_ALGORITHM', u'Value': u'ssh-rsa'}, {u'Name': u'SPRING_CLOUD_CONFIG_SERVER_GIT_PRIVATE_KEY', u'Value': u'SpringCloudConfigServerGitPrivateKey'}, {u'Name': u'JAVA_OPTS', u'Value': u'-Xmx128m'}], u'Memory': u'ContainerMemory', u'PortMappings': [{u'ContainerPort': u'ContainerPort'}]}]
The URI for the config server of the application
